roleset.name: like a bird
roleset.note: NEST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nest' based on sentences in brown. (from nest.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: nicely inverted syntax
example.text: Below in the open bay facing Manhattan was Staten Island, gritty with clam shells and mud flats behind which nested [*T*-2] farms, cattle barns, and berry thickets.
example.arg: behind which -*gt; clam shells and mud flats
farms, cattle barns, and berry thickets

example.name: literal bird
example.text: A scant half mile away Shelley and Mary were doubtless sitting on their diminutive terrace, the air about them scented with stock, and listening to the nightingale who [*T*-1] had nested in the big lime tree at the foot of the garden.
example.arg: in the big lime tree at the foot of the garden

example.name: pseudopassive/adjectival
example.text: Next, [the hen]-1 was nested [*-1]and all seemed well.
